decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The flat roof to be created shall not be used to form a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties. | The existing car parking spaces at the front and rear of the house shall ve kept continuously available for car parking for occupants of the house and shall not be used for any other purpose.  REASON:  To ensure that there is adequate provision for car parking within the site.
description: Two-storey side and single storey rear extension
